highlights.description: **Reliability**: Automatic failover with fallback providers and circuit breaker pattern ensure your app stays up even when providers fail
**Cost Optimization**: Response caching reduces API costs by returning cached responses for identical requests
**Error Prevention**: Pre-flight token estimation validates requests before sending, avoiding context window limit errors

added.description: **Fallback Providers**: Automatic failover to backup providers when primary fails (retryable errors only)
**Circuit Breaker**: Prevents cascading failures by temporarily skipping unhealthy providers
**Token Estimation**: Pre-flight token counting to validate requests before sending to API
**Response Caching**: Cache identical requests using KVS backend with configurable TTL
`FallbackProviders` and `CircuitBreakerConfig` fields in `ClientConfig`
`TokenEstimator` interface with built-in context windows for 40+ models
`CacheManager` with SHA-256 based cache key generation
`ErrorCategory` type with `ClassifyError()` and `IsRetryableError()` for error classification
`FallbackError` type with detailed attempt tracking
`TokenLimitError` for pre-flight validation failures
`TopK` sampling parameter in `ChatCompletionRequest` (Anthropic, Gemini, Ollama)
`Seed` parameter for reproducible outputs (OpenAI, X.AI, Ollama)
`N` parameter for multiple completions (OpenAI)
`ResponseFormat` type and field for JSON mode responses (OpenAI, Gemini)
`Logprobs` and `TopLogprobs` parameters for log probability output (OpenAI)
`ErrNoProviders` error for when `ClientConfig.Providers` is empty

changed.description: `ClientConfig` refactored to use unified `Providers []ProviderConfig` slice (index 0 = primary, 1+ = fallbacks)
`ProviderConfig` now supports `CustomProvider` field for 3rd party provider injection
Provider constructors refactored to accept `ProviderConfig` instead of `ClientConfig`
`CreateChatCompletion` now supports optional token validation and response caching
All provider adapters updated to pass through newly supported parameters

documentation.description: README.md updated with Fallback Providers, Circuit Breaker, Token Estimation, and Response Caching documentation
RELEASE_NOTES_v0.11.0.md added with comprehensive release notes

added.description: Claude 4.5 model family: `claude-opus-4-5-20251101`, `claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929`, `claude-haiku-4-5-20251001`
`ClientConfig.Timeout` field for configurable HTTP client timeout (recommended 300s for reasoning models)
Marp presentation and GitHub Pages HTML documentation

changed.description: HTTP client handling refactored with `getHTTPClient()` helper integrating both `HTTPClient` and `Timeout` configurations

added.description: ROADMAP.md with project direction

changed.description: Module renamed from `github.com/grokify/fluxllm` to `github.com/grokify/metallm` for consistency with `metaserp`
Bedrock provider moved to standalone SDK at `github.com/grokify/fluxllm-bedrock`

added.description: `ObservabilityHook` interface for non-invasive tracing, logging, and metrics integration
`LLMCallInfo` with unique `CallID` for correlating hook calls in concurrent scenarios
Injectable `*slog.Logger` with null logger default for structured logging
Context-aware logging via `slogutil.ContextWithLogger` for request-scoped correlation
`ClientConfig.HTTPClient` for custom HTTP transports (retry, tracing, metrics)
Retry with exponential backoff support via `mogo/net/http/retryhttp`

fixed.description: Memory-aware methods (`CreateChatCompletionWithMemory`, `CreateChatCompletionStreamWithMemory`) now properly invoke observability hooks

added.description: Model constants for all providers in `models/` package

changed.description: README.md updated for v0.6.0 Grok models documentation

added.description: X.AI Grok provider with full streaming support and Grok 4.1/4/3/2 model families
Anthropic native streaming via Server-Sent Events (SSE)
`ProviderMetadata` field in `ChatCompletionResponse` and `ChatCompletionChunk` for preserving provider-specific information
Comprehensive test suite with 44 automated tests (unit + integration)
Mock KVS infrastructure for testing conversation memory
Anthropic streaming example in `examples/anthropic_streaming`
X.AI usage examples in `examples/xai`

fixed.description: Anthropic streaming now fully functional with proper SSE parsing and event type handling

added.description: Google Gemini provider with chat and streaming support
Custom external provider support via `Provider` interface injection
Custom provider example in `examples/custom_provider`

changed.description: Major provider architecture refactor (3 phases): internal providers moved to provider-specific directories
README.md updated with Ollama in architecture section

added.description: Ollama provider for local LLM inference
Memory documentation
Ollama example in `examples/providers_demo`

changed.description: Dependencies updated: AWS SDK Bedrock Runtime 1.37.1→1.38.0, AWS SDK Config 1.31.2→1.31.5, sogo 0.12.0→0.12.1

added.description: Conversation memory feature for stateful interactions
CodeQL SAST security scanning in CI
Model constants in dedicated file

changed.description: golangci-lint configuration updated for false positives

added.description: Initial release with unified LLM SDK
OpenAI provider with GPT model support
Anthropic Claude provider
AWS Bedrock provider
Chat completions API with synchronous and streaming support
CI/CD workflows: golangci-lint, dependabot, CodeQL
